bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_in_ID.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_in_ID.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_in_ID.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

Creato da [ROYAL]Anuken[] - [SKY]anukendev@gmail.com[]

bundle_it.properties.host.info:
Il pulsante [accent]hos [] ospita un server sulle porte [scarlet]6567[] e [scarlet]656.[] Chiunque sulla stessa [LIGHT_GRAY]connessione wifi o rete locale[] dovrebbe essere in grado di vedere il proprio server nel proprio elenco server.

 Se vuoi che le persone siano in grado di connettersi ovunque tramite IP,  richiesto il [accent]port forwarding[]. 

[LIGHT_GRAY]Nota: se qualcuno sta riscontrando problemi durante la connessione al gioco LAN, assicurati di aver consentito a Mindustry di accedere alla rete locale nelle impostazioni del firewall.
bundle_it.properties.join.info:
Qui  possibile inserire un [accent]IP del server[] a cui connettersi, o scoprire [accento]un server sulla rete locale[] disponibile.
 Sono supportati sia il multiplayer LAN che WAN. 

[LIGHT_GRAY]Nota: non esiste un elenco di server globali automatici; se si desidera connettersi a qualcuno tramite IP,  necessario chiedere all'host il proprio IP.

bundle_it.properties.item.titanium.description: Un raro metallo super leggero usato ampiamente nel trasporto di liquidi, trapani e navi.
bundle_it.properties.item.thorium.name: Torio
bundle_it.properties.item.thorium.description: Un materiale denso e radioattivo, utilizzato nella costruzione di strutture e come carburante del reattore nucleare.
bundle_it.properties.item.silicon.name: Silicio
bundle_it.properties.item.silicon.description: Un semiconduttore molto utile che viene utilizzato nei pannelli solari e nei macchinari elettronici.
bundle_it.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastaniu
bundle_it.properties.item.plastanium.description: Un materiale leggero e duttile, utilizzato nelle navi avanzete e come munizione.
bundle_it.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_it.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_it.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Surge Alloy
bundle_it.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_it.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Spore Pod
bundle_it.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_it.properties.item.sand.name: sabbia
bundle_it.properties.item.sand.description: Un materiale base che viene altamente usato nei processi di fusione, Sia come lega che come lubrificante.
bundle_it.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Polvere esplosiva
bundle_it.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Un composto altamente volatile, utilizzato nella produzione di bombe ed esplosivi. Pu essere utilizzato come combustibile anche se non  consigliato.
bundle_it.properties.item.pyratite.name: Pirite
bundle_it.properties.item.pyratite.description: Una sostanza molto infiammabile che viene utilizzata nelle armi a fuoco.
bundle_it.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metaglass
bundle_it.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_it.properties.item.scrap.name: Scrap
bundle_it.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.water.name: acqua
bundle_it.properties.liquid.slag.name: Slag
bundle_it.properties.liquid.oil.name: petrolio
bundle_it.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: criogenium
bundle_it.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_it.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: Il mech standard.  abbastanza veloce e produce abbastanza danni; pu anche generare 3 droni per aumentare il suo danno complessivo.
bundle_it.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_it.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Un veloce, poco armato mech fatto per giocare a tocca e fuga con il nemico. Fa poco danno alle strutture, ma pu uccidere un gran nummero di nemici grazie alle sue armi ad alto voltaggio.
bundle_it.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_it.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: Un mach di supporto. Cura i blocchi danneggiati sparandogli contro. Pu spegnere fuochi e curare i compagni di squadra.
bundle_it.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_it.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Un ingombrante e ben armato mech, fatto per stare in prima linea. La sue difese possono bloccare fino al 90% dei danni.
bundle_it.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_it.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Una navicella standard. Molto veloce e leggera, ma pu minare pochi blocchi e ha scarse potenzialit nella difesa.
bundle_it.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_it.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Una navetta da tocca e fuga. Anche se inizialmente lenta, pu accellerare ad alte velocit e voloare sopra gli avamposti dei nemici, pu provocare molti danni ai nemici tramite l'utilizzo di fulmini o missili.
bundle_it.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Tridente
bundle_it.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: Un bombardiere pesante. Gistamente ben protetto.
bundle_it.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_it.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Una grande e ben armata macchina da guerra. Equipaggiato con ripetitore di fiamma e con alta accellerazione e velocit massima.

bundle_it.properties.unit.spirit.name: Spirit Drone
bundle_it.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks.
bundle_it.properties.unit.phantom.name: Phantom Drone
bundle_it.properties.unit.phantom.description: An advanced drone unit. Automatically mines ores, collects items and repairs blocks. Significantly more effective than a drone.
bundle_it.properties.unit.dagger.name: Pericolo
bundle_it.properties.unit.dagger.description: Un unit terrena base, molto pi efficiente se in branco.
bundle_it.properties.unit.crawler.name: Crawler
bundle_it.properties.unit.titan.name: Titano
bundle_it.properties.unit.titan.description: Un'unit di terra corazzata avanzata. Utilizza carburo come munizione. Attacca sia bersagli terrestri che aerei.
bundle_it.properties.unit.ghoul.name: Ghoul Bomber
bundle_it.properties.unit.ghoul.description: A heavy carpet bomber. Uses blast compound or pyratite as ammo.

bundle_it.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_it.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_it.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_it.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_it.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_it.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_it.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_it.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_it.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_it.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_it.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_it.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_it.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_it.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_it.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_it.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_it.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_it.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_it.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_it.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_it.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_it.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_it.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_it.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_it.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_it.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_it.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_it.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_it.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_it.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_it.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_it.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_it.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_it.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_it.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_it.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_it.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_it.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_it.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_it.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_it.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_it.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_it.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_it.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_it.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_it.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_it.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_it.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_it.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_it.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_it.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_it.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_it.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_it.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_it.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_it.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_it.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_it.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_it.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_it.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_it.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_it.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_it.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_nl.properties.host.info:
The [accent]host[] button hosts a server on port [scarlet]6567[]. 
Anybody on the same [LIGHT_GRAY]wifi or local network[] should be able to see your server in their server list.

If you want people to be able to connect from anywhere by IP, [accent]port forwarding[] is required.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Note: If someone is experiencing trouble connecting to your LAN game, make sure you have allowed Mindustry access to your local network in your firewall settings.
bundle_nl.properties.join.info:
Here, you can enter a [accent]server IP[] to connect to, or discover [accent]local network[] servers to connect to.
Both LAN and WAN multiplayer is supported.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Note: There is no automatic global server list; if you want to connect to someone by IP, you would need to ask the host for their IP.

bundle_nl.properties.item.copper.name: Copper
bundle_nl.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.item.lead.name: Lead
bundle_nl.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.item.coal.name: Coal
bundle_nl.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.graphite.name: Graphite
bundle_nl.properties.item.titanium.name: Titanium
bundle_nl.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl.properties.item.thorium.name: Thorium
bundle_nl.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.silicon.name: Silicon
bundle_nl.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastanium
bundle_nl.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_nl.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Surge Alloy
bundle_nl.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Spore Pod
bundle_nl.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl.properties.item.sand.name: Sand
bundle_nl.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Blast Compound
bundle_nl.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl.properties.item.pyratite.name: Pyratite
bundle_nl.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metaglass
bundle_nl.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_nl.properties.item.scrap.name: Scrap
bundle_nl.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.water.name: Water
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.slag.name: Slag
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.oil.name: Oil
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: Cryofluid
bundle_nl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_nl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output; can create up to 3 drones for increased offensive capability.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_nl.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_nl.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_nl.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_nl.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_nl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Trident
bundle_nl.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_nl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_nl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.

bundle_nl.properties.unit.spirit.description: The starter drone unit. Spawns in the core by default. Automatically mines ores and repairs blocks.

bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_nl.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_nl.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at half capacity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. Adjacent containers, vaults and cores will be treated as a single storage unit. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates spores with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_nl.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_nl.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_nl.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.discord: Sluit je aan bij de Mindustry discord server!
bundle_nl_BE.properties.link.itch.io.description: Itch.io pagina met de PC downloads en online versie
bundle_nl_BE.properties.linkfail: Openen van link mislukt!\nDe link is gekopierd naar je klembord.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.screenshot.invalid: Kaart te groot, mogelijks te weinig geheugen voor een screenshot te kunnen maken.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.placeline:
You have selected a block.
You can[accent] place in a line[] by[accent] holding down your finger for a few seconds[] and dragging in a direction.

[scarlet]DO IT.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.removearea:
You have selected removal mode.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.server.kicked.customClient: Deze server ondersteunt geen aangepaste versies (mods). Download een officile versie.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.host.info:
Ook De [accent]host[] knop hosts een server op poort [scarlet]6567[]. 
Iedereen die verbonden is met dezelfde [LIGHT_GRAY]wifi of lokaal netwerk[] zou je server moeten zien in zijn server lijst.

Als je wil dat personen kunnen verbinden met je server van ergens anders via IP. Dan is [accent]port forwarding[] is nodig.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Nota: Als iemand problemen heeft met het verbinden tot je LAN spel, zorg dan dat mindustry toestemming heeft tot je lokale netwerk in de Firewall instellingen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.join.info: Hier kan je een [accent]server IP[] invullen waarmee je wil verbinden. Je kan hier ook verbinden met servers op je [accent]lokale netwerk[]. LAN en WAN multiplayer wordt ondersteund.\n\n[LIGHT_GRAY]Belangrijk: er is geen automatische globale server lijst; als je met iemand wil verbinden via een IP adres moet je zijn/haar IP adres vragen.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.hosts.none: [lightgray]Geen games op je lokale netwerk gevonden.

bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.copper.name: Copper
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.lead.name: Lead
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.coal.name: Coal
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.graphite.name: Graphite
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.titanium.name: Titanium
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.thorium.name: Thorium
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.silicon.name: Silicon
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastanium
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Surge Alloy
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Spore Pod
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.sand.name: Sand
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Blast Compound
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.pyratite.name: Pyratite
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metaglass
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.scrap.name: Scrap
bundle_nl_BE.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.water.name: Water
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.slag.name: Slag
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.oil.name: Oil
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: Cryofluid
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Trident
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_nl_BE.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: A large, well-armored gunship. Equipped with an incendiary repeater. Good acceleration and maximum speed.
