bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes scrap into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores into industry-ready pods.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_nl_BE.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_pl.properties.mode.sandbox.name: Piaskownica
bundle_pl.properties.mode.sandbox.description: Nieskoczone surowce i fale bez odliczania. Dla przedszkolakw!

bundle_pl.properties.mode.attack.description: Brak fal, celem jest zniszczenie bazy przeciwnika.

bundle_pl.properties.item.copper.name: Mied
bundle_pl.properties.item.copper.description: Przydatny materia budowlany. Szeroko uywany w prawie kadej konstrukcji.
bundle_pl.properties.item.lead.name: Ow
bundle_pl.properties.item.lead.description: Podstawowy matria. Uywany w przesyle przemiotw i pynw. Nie jest on przypadkiem szkodliwy?
bundle_pl.properties.item.coal.name: Wgiel
bundle_pl.properties.item.coal.description: Zwyky i atwo dostpny materia energetyczny.
bundle_pl.properties.item.graphite.name: Grafit
bundle_pl.properties.item.titanium.name: Tytan
bundle_pl.properties.item.titanium.description: Rzadki i bardzo lekki materia. Uywany w bardzo zaawansowanym przewodnictwie, wiertach i samolotach. Poczuj si jak Tytan!
bundle_pl.properties.item.thorium.name: Uran
bundle_pl.properties.item.thorium.description: Zwarty i radioaktywny materia uywany w struktucrach i paliwie nuklearnym. Nie trzymaj go w rkach!
bundle_pl.properties.item.silicon.name: Krzem
bundle_pl.properties.item.silicon.description: Niesamowicie przydatny pprzewodnk uywany w panelach sonecznych i skomplikowanej elektronice. Nie, w Dolinie Krzemowej ju nie ma krzemu.
bundle_pl.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastan
bundle_pl.properties.item.plastanium.description: Lekki i plastyczny materia uywany w amunicji odamkowej i samolotach. Uywany te w klockach LEGO (dlatego s niezniszczalne)!
bundle_pl.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Wkno Fazowe
bundle_pl.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Niewiarygodnie lekkie wkno uywane w zaawansowanej elektronice i technologii samo-naprawiajcej si.
bundle_pl.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Energetyczny Stop
bundle_pl.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Zaawansowany materia z niesychanymi wartociami energetycznymi.
bundle_pl.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Spore Pod
bundle_pl.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_pl.properties.item.sand.name: Piasek
bundle_pl.properties.item.sand.description: Zwyky materia uywany pospolicie w przepalaniu, stopach i jako topnik. Dostanie piaskiem po oczach nie jest przyjemne.
bundle_pl.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Wybuchowy zwizek
bundle_pl.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Lotny zwizek uywany w pirotechnice. Moe by uywany jako materia energetyczny, ale nie polecam. BOOOM!
bundle_pl.properties.item.pyratite.name: Piratian
bundle_pl.properties.item.pyratite.description: Niesamowicie palny zwizek uywany w zbrojeniu. Nielegalny w 9 pastwach.
bundle_pl.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metaszko
bundle_pl.properties.item.metaglass.description: Niesamowite silne szko. Szeroko uywane w transporcie i przechowywaniu pynw.
bundle_pl.properties.item.scrap.name: Resztki
bundle_pl.properties.item.scrap.description: Pozostaoci starych budynkw i jednostek. Skada si z maej iloci wszystkiego.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.water.name: Woda
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.slag.name: Slag
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.oil.name: Ropa
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: Lodociecz
bundle_pl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_pl.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: Standardowy mech. rednia bro i prdko, le potrafi stworzy trzy mae drony do walki.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_pl.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Szybki i wraliwy mech stworzony do szybkih atakw i ucieczki. Budynk robi prawie nic, le jest wstanie szybko rozwali grup wrogich jednostek piorunami.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_pl.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: Mech pomocny. Naprawia budynki druyny, strzelajc w nie. Potrafi wygasi niedalekie poary i uleczy bliskich przyjaci.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_pl.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Duy i silny mech, zaprojektowany na ataki. Jego zdolno pozwala mu na zablokowanie do 90% zagroe.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Strzaka
bundle_pl.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Standardowy statek. Lekki i szybki, ale jest kiepski jak chodzi o walk i kopanie.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_pl.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Statek do ataku i szybkiej ucieczki. Zaczyna powoli, ale przyspiesza do wielkiej prdkoci. Przy tej prdkoci, moe przelecie koo wrogiej bazy i atakowa piorunami czy rakietami.
bundle_pl.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Trjzb
bundle_pl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glewia
bundle_pl.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Duy, uzbrojony statek. Dobra prdko i przyspieszenie. Ma ognisty karabin.

bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_pl.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_pl.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_pl.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_pl.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_pl.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals blocks in its vicinity.
bundle_pl.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_pl.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_pl.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_pl.properties.block.duo.description: A small, cheap turret. Useful against ground units.
bundle_pl.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_pl.properties.block.arc.description: A small close-range turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_pl.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_pl.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_pl.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_pl.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_pl.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_pl.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_pl.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_pl.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_pl.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_pl.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coal in order to produce silicon.
bundle_pl.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_pl.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes scrap into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_pl.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_pl.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_pl.properties.block.melter.description: Melts down scrap into slag for further processing or usage in turrets.
bundle_pl.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_pl.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_pl.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_pl.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_pl.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates power when placed in hot locations.
bundle_pl.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_pl.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied. Power output depends on fullness, with base power generated at full capacity.
bundle_pl.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_pl.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_pl.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_pl.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items of each type. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_pl.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_pl.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_pl.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_pl.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates tiny concentrations of spores into industry-ready pods.
bundle_pl.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_pl.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_pl.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_pl.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_pl.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_pl.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Zaawansowany blok do przenoszenia cieczy. Transportuje je szybciej i magazynuje wicej ni standardowe rury.
bundle_pl.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Zaawansowany blok do przenoszenia cieczy. Uywa prdu, aby przenie ciecz do poczonego phase conduit przez kilka blokw.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Dziaa jak most dla dwch krzyujcych si rur. Przydatne w sytuacjach, kiedy dwie rury maj rne ciecze do rnych lokacji.
bundle_pl.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Zaawansowany blok przenoszcy ciecze. Pozwala na przenoszenie cieczy nawet do 3 blokw na kadym terenie, przez kady budynek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Tania pompa o niskiej przepustowoci. Nie wymaga prdu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Zaawansowana pompa, dwukrotnie wiksza przepustowo od mechanicznej pompy. Wymaga prdu.
bundle_pl.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_pl.properties.block.router.description: Akceptuje przedmioty z jednego miejsca i rozdziela je do trzech innych kierunkw. Przydatne w rozdzielaniu materiaw z jednego rda do wielu celw.
bundle_pl.properties.block.distributor.description: Zaawansowany rozdzielacz, rozdzielajcy przedmioty do 7 innych kierunkw.
bundle_pl.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Zaawansowany blok transportujcy. Pozwala na przenoszenie przedmiotw nawet do 3 blokw na kadym terenie, przez kady budynek.
bundle_pl.properties.block.item-source.description: Wydziela przedmioty w nieskoczono. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Wydziela ciecz w nieskoczono. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.block.item-void.description: Niszczy wszystkie przedmioty, ktre id do tego bloku, ktry nie wymaga prdu. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-source.description: Wydziela prd w nieskoczono. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.block.power-void.description: Niszczy ca energi wprowadzon do tego bloku. Dostpny tylko w trybie sandbox.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.water.description: Powszechnie uywana do schadzania budowli i przetwarzania odpadw.
bundle_pl.properties.liquid.oil.description: Moe si pali, eksplodowa lub by uywana do schadzania.

Qualquer um no [LIGHT_GRAY]Wi-fi Ou Internet local[] Pode ver este servidor na lista de servidores.

Se voce quer poder entrar em qualquer servidor em seu ip, [accent]port forwarding[]  requerido.

[LIGHT_GRAY]Note: Se alguem esta com problemas em conectar no seu servidor lan, Tenha certeza que deixou mindustry Acessar sua internet local nas configuraes de firewall

[LIGHT_GRAY]Note: No tem uma lista de servidores automaticos; Se voc quer conectar ao IP de alguem, Voc precisa pedir o IP Ao Rosteador.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.thorium.name: Urnio

bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Fabrica fase
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: Uma substancia quase sem peso Usado em eletronica avanada E tecnologia de auto-reparo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Liga de surto
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: Uma liga com propriedades unicas eletricas.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Pod de esporos
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Usado em converso para oleo, Combustivel e explosivos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.sand.name: Areia
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.sand.description: Um material comum Que  usado intensivamente em derretimento, Tanto em ligas como fluxo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Composto de exploso
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.blast-compound.description: Um composto volatil usado em bombas em bombas em explosivos. Enquanto pode ser queimado como combustivel, Isso no  recomendado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.pyratite.name: piratita
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.pyratite.description: Substancia extremamente inflamavel usado em armas incendiarias.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metavidro
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.metaglass.description: Composto de vidro super-Resistente. Extensivamente usado Para distribuio de lquido e armazem.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.scrap.name: Sucata
bundle_pt_BR.properties.item.scrap.description: Pedaos remanescentes de estruturas e unidades destruidas.. Contem traos de diferentes metais.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alfa
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: O meca padro. Tem uma saida de dano e velocidade decente; Pode criar at 3 drones Para capacidades ofensivas aumentadas.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: Um meca rapido, De baixa armadura Feito for para ataques rapidos. Da pouco dano as estruturas, Mas pode matar grandes grupos de unidades inimigas muito rapidamente Com sua arma ARC.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: O meca de suporte. Conserta blocos aliados Atirando neles. Pode extinguir o fogo e consertar aliados em uma distancia Com sua habilidade de consertar.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: Um meca volumoso e bem armadurado, Feito para assaltos da primeira linha. Sua habilidade de armadura Pode bloquear 90% de dano.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dardo
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: Nave padro. Consideravelmente leve e rapido, Tem pouca capacidade ofensiva E baixa velocidade de minerao.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: Uma nave de espinhos de atacar e correr. Quando inicialmente lento, pode acelerar a altas velocidades e voar at bases inimigas, Dando altas quantidades de dano Com seus raios e habilidades.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Tridente
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: Um bombardeiro pesado. Consideravelmente bem armadurado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.glaive-ship.name: Glaive
bundle_pt_BR.properties.mech.glaive-ship.description: Uma nave armada, bem armadurada. Com um repetidor incendario equipado. Boa acelerao e maxima velocidade.

bundle_pt_BR.properties.unit.reaper.name: Ceifador
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.begin: Sua misso aqui  de erradicar[LIGHT_GRAY] Inimigo[].\n\nComee por[accent] Minerar cobre[]. Clique numa veia de cobre perto de seu core para fazer isso.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.drill: Minerar manualmente  ineficiente.\n[accent]Mineradoras []podem minerar automaticamente.\nColoque uma numa veia de cobre.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Esteiras[] So usadas para transportar itens at o core.\nFaa uma linha de Esteiras da mineradora at o core.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.morecopper: Mais cobre  preciso.\n\nTanto minere manualmente, Ou coloque mais mineradoras.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.turret: Estruturas defensivas devem ser construidas para repelir[LIGHT_GRAY] O inimigo[].\nConstrua uma torre dupla perto de sua base.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Torres duplas precisam de[accent] Cobre como munio []Para atirar.\nColoque uma mineradoura Proxima a torre Para carregar ela com cobre minerado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.waves: O[LIGHT_GRAY] Inimigo[] se aproxima.\n\nDefenda seu core por 2 ondas. Construa mais torres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.lead: Mais minerios esto disponiveis. Explore e minere[accent] Cobre[].\n\nArraste Da sua unidade at o core para transferir recursos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Cobre e chumbo so materiais fracos.
Liga densa[accent] Superior[] Pode ser feito num fundidor.

Construa um.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.densealloy: O fundidor agora vai fazer a liga.\nPegue.\nMelhore a produo se necessario.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
O core agora vai criar[accent] O drone Spirit[] Para minerar e consertar blocos.

Fabricas para outras unidades podem ser criadas usando [accent] silicio.
Faa um fundidor de Silicio.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicio requer[accent] carvo[] e[accent] areia[].\nComee a fazer mineradouras.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.generator: Essa tecnologia requer energia.\nCrie[accent] um gerador a combusto[] para isso.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Gerador de combusto requer combustivel.\nCarregue com carvo minerado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.node: Energia requer transporte.\nCrie um[accent] Nodo de energia[] Proximo do gerador de combusto.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Poder pode ser transportado construindo blocos de energia e geradores, Apenas construindo nodos de Energia.\n\nLigue a energia clicando no nodo e selecionando o gerador e o fundidor de silicio.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicio esta sendo feito. Pegue.\n\nMelhorar a produo  recomendado.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construa uma[accent] Fabrica do meca Dagger.[]\n\nIsso vai ser feito para construi mecas de ataque.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.router: Fabricas precisam de recursos pra construir\nCrie um roteador para espalhadar recursos da esteira.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Ligue os nodos de energia a fabrica.
Quando os requerimentos forem alcanados, Um meca vai ser criado.

Crie mais mineradoras, geradoras e esteiras se necessario.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.tutorial.battle: O[LIGHT_GRAY] Inimigo[] revelou seu core.\nDestrua com sua unidade e Dagger's.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.copper-wall.description: Um bloco defensivo e barato.\nUtil para proteger o core e torres no comeo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: Um bloco defensivo e barato.\nUtil para proteger o core e torres no comeo.\nOcupa multiplos espaos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nBoa proteo contra inimigos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: Um bloco grande e defensivo.\nBoa proteo contra inimigos.\nOcupa multiplos espaos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-wall.description: No to forte quanto a parede de torio Mas vai defletir balas a menos que seja muito forte.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: No to forte quanto a parde de torio mas vai defletir balas a menos que seja muito forte.\nOcupa multiplos espaos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.surge-wall.description: O bloco defensivo mais forte.\nQue tem uma pequena chance de lancar um raio Contra o atacante.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: O bloco defensivo mais forte.\nQue tem uma pequena chance de lancar um raio Contra o atacante.\nOcupa multiplos espaos
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.door.description: Uma pequena porta que pode ser aberta o fechada quando voce clica.\nSe aberta, Os inimigos podem atirar e passar.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.door-large.description: Uma grande porta que pode ser aberta o fechada quando voce clica.\nSe aberta, Os inimigos podem atirar e passar..\nOcupa multiplos espaos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Aumenta a velocidade de unidades proximas de geradores e esteiras.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.force-projector.description: Cria um campo de forca hexagonal em volta de si mesmo, Protegendo construes e unidades dentro de dano por balas.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Danifica inimigos em cima da mina. Quase invisivel ao inimigo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.arc.description: Uma pequena torre que atira eletricidade em um pequeno arc aleatoriamente no inimigo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.lancer.description: Uma torre de Tamanho-Medio que atira raios de eletricidade.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.wave.description: Uma torre que Tamanho medio que atira bolhas.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.salvo.description: Uma torre media que da tiros em salvos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.swarmer.description: Uma torre media que atira ondas de misseis.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.ripple.description: Uma grande torre que atira simultaneamente.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.cyclone.description: Uma grande torre de tiro rapido.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.fuse.description: Uma torre grande que atira raios de curta distancia poderosos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.spectre.description: Uma grande torre que da dois tiros poderosos ao mesmo tempo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.meltdown.description: Uma grande torre que atira dois raios poderosos ao mesmo tempo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.conveyor.description: Bloco de transporte de item basico. Move os itens a frente e os deposita automaticamente Em torres ou construtores. Rotacionavel.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Bloco de transporte de item avancado. Move itens mais rapidos que esteiras padres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Bloco de transporte de item avanado. Usa energia para teleportar itens a uma esteira de fase sobre uma severa distancia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.junction.description: Funciona como uma ponte Para duas esteiras que estejam se cruzando. Util em situaes que tenha duas esteiras diferentes carregando materiais diferentes para lugares diferentes.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Bloco de transporte de itens supremo. Coleta itens severos e atira eles em outro mass driver de uma longa distancia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduz areia a coque altamente puro Para fazer silicio.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produz plastanio para usando oleo e titanio.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produz tecido de fase de torio radioativo e grandes quantidades de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produz liga de surge de titanio, chumbo, silicio e cobre.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Esmaga pedra em areia. Util quando esta em falta de areia natural.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mistura carvo, Cobre e areia em piratite altamente inflamavel
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Usa oleo em Transformar piratite em composto de exploso menos inflamavel mas mais explosivo
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combina agua e titanio em cryo fluido que  mais eficiente em esfriar.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.melter.description: Aquece pedra em altas temperaturas para fazer lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.incinerator.description: Se livra de itens em excesso ou liquidos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.separator.description: Expos pedra em agua em presso para ter varios mineiras contendo na pedra.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmite poder em nodos. Maximo de 4 fontes de energia, sinks ou nodos podem ser conectados. Os nodos vo receber energia de ou dar energia para qualquer bloco adjacente.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Tem um raio maior que o nodo de energia e pode conectar at 6 fontes de energia, sinks ou nodos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.battery.description: Guarda energia sempre que tiver em abundancia e da energia sempre que precisar enquanto tiver capacidade.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.battery-large.description: Guarda muito mais energia que uma beteria comum
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Gera poder usando combustivel ou oleo.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: Mais eficiente que o gerador de Combusto, Mas requer agua adicional.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Gera uma quantidade grande de energia usando lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Gera pequenas quantidades de energia do sol.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Da muito mais energia que o painel solar comum, Mas sua produo  mais cara.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Gera altas quantidades de energia do torio radioativo. Requer resfriamento constante. Vai explodir violentamente Se resfriamento insuficiente for fornecido.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: Um Gerador termoeltrico de radioistopos Que no precisa de refriamento Mas da muito mais energia que o reator de torio.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.unloader.description: Descarrega itens de um container, Descarrega em uma esteira ou diretamente em um bloco adjacente. O tipo de item que pode ser descarregado pode ser mudado clicando no descarregador.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.container.description: Carrega uma baixa quantidade de itens. Usado para criar fontes Quando no tem uma necessidade constante de materiais. Um[LIGHT_GRAY] Descarregador[] pode ser usado para recuperar esses itens do container.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.vault.description: Carrega uma alta quantidade de itens. Usado para criar fontes Quando no tem uma necessidade constante de materiais. Um[LIGHT_GRAY] Descarregador[] pode ser usado para recuperar esses itens do container.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: Uma mineradoura barata. Quando colocado em blocos apropriados, retira itens em um ritmo lento e indefinitavamente.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: Uma mineradora improvisada que  mais rapida e capaz de processar mateirais mais duros usando a pressao do ar
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Possibilita a minerao ainda mais rapida usando tecnologia a laser, Mas requer poder adcionalmente torio radioativo pode ser recuperado com essa mineradora
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.blast-drill.description: A melhor mineradora. Requer muita energia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extrai agua do cho. Use quando no tive nenhum lago proximo
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultiva o solo com agua para pegar bio materia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Usa altas quantidades de energia Para extrair oleo da areia. Use quando no tiver fontes de oleo por perto
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para um bombardeiro resionavelmente bem armadurado.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para um interceptador forte e rapido com armas de raio.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para grande, bem armadurada nave de combate.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para o meca de suporte que pode consertar construes aliadas e unidades.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para o rapido, Levemente armadurado meca feito para ataques rapidos.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Deixe sua atual embarcao e mude para o volumoso e bem armadurado meca feito para ataques da primeira linha.\nUse o pad clicando duas vezes em cima enquando fica em cima dele.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produz drones leves que mineram e reparam blocos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produz unidades de drone avancadas Que so significativamente mais efetivos que um drone spirit.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.wraith-factory.description: produz unidades interceptor de ataque rapido.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.titan-factory.description: Produz unidades avancadas, armaduradas e terrestres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.fortress-factory.description: Produz unidades terrestres pesadas de artilharia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.revenant-factory.description: Produz unidades laser, pesadas e terrestres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuamente repara a unidade danificada mais proxima.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.conduit.description: Bloco de transporte de liquido basico. Funciona como a esteira, Mas com liquidos. Melhor usado com extratores, Bombas ou condutos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Bloco avancado de transporte de liquido. Transporta liquidos mais rapido E armazena mais que os condutos padres.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Bloco avancado de transporte de liquido. Usa energia para teleportar liquidos conduto de fase sobre uma distancia severa.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Aceita liquidos de uma direco e os joga em 3 direes igualmente. Pode armazenar uma certa quantidade de liquido. Util para espalhar liquidosd a fonte para multiplos alvos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Armazena grandes quantidades de liquido. Use quando a demanda de materiais no for constante ou para guardar itens para resfriar blocos vitais.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Age como uma ponte para dois canos que se cruzam. Util em situaes que tem dois condutos carregando liquidos diferentes at localizaes diferentes.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Bloco de transporte de liquidos avancados. Possibilita o transporte de liquido sobre 3 blocos acima de construes ou paredes
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: Uma bomba barata mais saida de liquidos lenta, Sem consumo de energia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: Uma bomba avancada que duplica a velocidade da saida de liquida usando energia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: A melhor bomba. Trez vezes mais rapida que a bomba mecanica e a unica bomba capaz de pegar lava.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.router.description: Aceita itens de uma direo e os divide em 3 direes igualmente. Util para espalhar materiais da fonte para multiplos alvos.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.distributor.description: Um roteador avancada que espalhas os itens em 7 outras direes igualmente.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Bloco de transporte de itens avancado. Possibilita o transporte de itens acima de 3 blocos de construo ou paredes.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.item-source.description: Infinivamente da itens. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.liquid-source.description: Infinitivamente da Liquidos. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroi qualquer item que entre sem requerir energia. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-source.description: Infinitivamente da energia. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.block.power-void.description: Destroi qualquer energia que entre dentro. Apenas caixa de areia.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.water.description: Comumente usado em resfriamento e no processo de perda.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.oil.description: Pode ser queimado, explodido ou usado como resfriador.
bundle_pt_BR.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: A maneira mais eficiente de resfriar qualquer coisa.

bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.begin: Your mission here is to eradicate the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\n\nBegin by[accent] mining copper[]. Tap a copper ore vein near your core to do this.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.drill: Mining manually is inefficient.\n[accent]Drills []can mine automatically.\nPlace one on a copper vein.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.conveyor: [accent]Conveyors[] are used to transport items to the core.\nMake a line of conveyors from the drill to the core.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.morecopper: More copper is required.\n\nEither mine it manually, or place more drills.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.turret: Defensive structures must be built to repel the[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[].\nBuild a duo turret near your base.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.drillturret: Duo turrets require[accent] copper ammo []to shoot.\nPlace a drill next to the turret to supply it with mined copper.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.waves: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] approaches.\n\nDefend your core for 2 waves. Build more turrets.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.lead: More ores are available. Explore and mine[accent] lead[].\n\nDrag from your unit to the core to transfer resources.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.smelter:
Copper and lead are weak metals.
Superior[accent] Dense Alloy[] can be created in a smelter.

Build one.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.densealloy: The smelter will now produce alloy.\nGet some.\nImprove the production if necessary.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.siliconsmelter:
The core will now create a[accent] spirit drone[] for mining and repairing blocks.

Factories for other units can be created with [accent] silicon.
Make a silicon smelter.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.silicondrill: Silicon requires[accent] coal[] and[accent] sand[].\nStart by making drills.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.generator: This technology requires power.\nCreate a[accent] combustion generator[] for it.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.generatordrill: Combustion generators need fuel.\nFuel it with coal from a drill.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.node: Power requires transport.\nCreate a[accent] power node[] next to your combustion generator to transfer its power.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.nodelink: Power can be transferred through contacting power blocks and generators, or by linked power nodes.\n\nLink power by tapping the node and selecting the generator and silicon smelter.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.silicon: Silicon is being produced. Get some.\n\nImproving the production system is advised.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.daggerfactory: Construct a[accent] dagger mech factory.[]\n\nThis will be used to create attack mechs.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.router: Factories need resources to function.\nCreate a router to split conveyor resources.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.dagger:
Link power nodes to the factory.
Once requirements are met, a mech will be created.

Create more drills, generators and conveyors as necessary.
bundle_tk.properties.tutorial.battle: The[LIGHT_GRAY] enemy[] has revealed their core.\nDestroy it with your unit and dagger mechs.
bundle_tk.properties.block.copper-wall.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.
bundle_tk.properties.block.copper-wall-large.description: A cheap defensive block.\nUseful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thorium-wall.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thorium-wall-large.description: A strong defensive block.\nGood protection from enemies.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-wall.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-wall-large.description: Not as strong as a thorium wall but will deflect bullets unless they are too powerful.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.surge-wall.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.
bundle_tk.properties.block.surge-wall-large.description: The strongest defensive block.\nHas a small chance of triggering lightning towards the attacker.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.door.description: A small door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.
bundle_tk.properties.block.door-large.description: A large door that can be opened and closed by tapping on it.\nIf opened, enemies can shoot and move through.\nSpans multiple tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.mend-projector.description: Periodically heals buildings in its vicinity.
bundle_tk.properties.block.overdrive-projector.description: Increases the speed of nearby buildings like drills and conveyors.
bundle_tk.properties.block.force-projector.description: Creates a hexagonal force field around itself, protecting buildings and units inside from damage through bullets.
bundle_tk.properties.block.shock-mine.description: Damages enemies stepping on the mine. Nearly invisible to the enemy.
bundle_tk.properties.block.scatter.description: A medium-sized anti-air turret. Sprays clumps of lead or scrap flak at enemy units.
bundle_tk.properties.block.arc.description: A small turret which shoots electricity in a random arc towards the enemy.
bundle_tk.properties.block.lancer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots charged electricity beams.
bundle_tk.properties.block.wave.description: A medium-sized rapid-fire turret which shoots liquid bubbles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.salvo.description: A medium-sized turret which fires shots in salvos.
bundle_tk.properties.block.swarmer.description: A medium-sized turret which shoots burst missiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.ripple.description: A large artillery turret which fires several shots simultaneously.
bundle_tk.properties.block.fuse.description: A large turret which shoots powerful short-range beams.
bundle_tk.properties.block.spectre.description: A large turret which shoots two powerful bullets at once.
bundle_tk.properties.block.meltdown.description: A large turret which shoots powerful long-range beams.
bundle_tk.properties.block.conveyor.description: Basic item transport block. Moved items forward and automatically deposits them into turrets or crafters. Rotatable.
bundle_tk.properties.block.titanium-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.
bundle_tk.properties.block.mass-driver.description: Ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range.
bundle_tk.properties.block.silicon-smelter.description: Reduces sand with highly pure coke in order to produce silicon.
bundle_tk.properties.block.plastanium-compressor.description: Produces plastanium from oil and titanium.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-weaver.description: Produces phase fabric from radioactive thorium and high amounts of sand.
bundle_tk.properties.block.alloy-smelter.description: Produces surge alloy from titanium, lead, silicon and copper.
bundle_tk.properties.block.pulverizer.description: Crushes stone into sand. Useful when there is a lack of natural sand.
bundle_tk.properties.block.pyratite-mixer.description: Mixes coal, lead and sand into highly flammable pyratite.
bundle_tk.properties.block.blast-mixer.description: Uses oil for transforming pyratite into the less flammable but more explosive blast compound.
bundle_tk.properties.block.cryofluidmixer.description: Combines water and titanium into cryofluid which is much more efficient for cooling.
bundle_tk.properties.block.melter.description: Heats up stone to very high temperatures to obtain lava.
bundle_tk.properties.block.incinerator.description: Gets rid of any excess item or liquid.
bundle_tk.properties.block.separator.description: Exposes stone to water pressure in order to obtain various minerals contained in the stone.
bundle_tk.properties.block.power-node.description: Transmits power to connected nodes. Up to four power sources, sinks or nodes can be connected. The node will receive power from or supply power to any adjacent blocks.
bundle_tk.properties.block.power-node-large.description: Has a larger radius than the power node and connects to up to six power sources, sinks or nodes.
bundle_tk.properties.block.battery.description: Stores power whenever there is an abundance and provides power whenever there is a shortage, as long as there is capacity left.
bundle_tk.properties.block.battery-large.description: Stores much more power than a regular battery.
bundle_tk.properties.block.combustion-generator.description: Generates power by burning oil or flammable materials.
bundle_tk.properties.block.turbine-generator.description: More efficient than a combustion generator, but requires additional water.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thermal-generator.description: Generates a large amount of power from lava.
bundle_tk.properties.block.solar-panel.description: Provides a small amount of power from the sun.
bundle_tk.properties.block.solar-panel-large.description: Provides much better power supply than a standard solar panel, but is also much more expensive to build.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thorium-reactor.description: Generates huge amounts of power from highly radioactive thorium. Requires constant cooling. Will explode violently if insufficient amounts of coolant are supplied.
bundle_tk.properties.block.rtg-generator.description: A radioisotope thermoelectric generator which does not require cooling but provides less power than a thorium reactor.
bundle_tk.properties.block.unloader.description: Unloads items from a container, vault or core onto a conveyor or directly into an adjacent block. The type of item to be unloaded can be changed by tapping on the unloader.
bundle_tk.properties.block.container.description: Stores a small amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the container.
bundle_tk.properties.block.vault.description: Stores a large amount of items. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials. An[LIGHT_GRAY] unloader[] can be used to retrieve items from the vault.
bundle_tk.properties.block.mechanical-drill.description: A cheap drill. When placed on appropriate tiles, outputs items at a slow pace indefinitely.
bundle_tk.properties.block.pneumatic-drill.description: An improved drill which is faster and able to process harder materials by making use of air pressure.
bundle_tk.properties.block.laser-drill.description: Allows drilling even faster through laser technology, but requires power. Additionally, radioactive thorium can be retrieved with this drill.
bundle_tk.properties.block.blast-drill.description: The ultimate drill. Requires large amounts of power.
bundle_tk.properties.block.water-extractor.description: Extracts water from the ground. Use it when there is no lake nearby.
bundle_tk.properties.block.cultivator.description: Cultivates the soil with water in order to obtain biomatter.
bundle_tk.properties.block.oil-extractor.description: Uses large amounts of power in order to extract oil from sand. Use it when there is no direct source of oil nearby.
bundle_tk.properties.block.trident-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a reasonably well armored heavy bomber.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.javelin-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a strong and fast interceptor with lightning weapons.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.glaive-ship-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a large, well-armored gunship.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.tau-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a support mech which can heal friendly buildings and units.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.delta-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.omega-mech-pad.description: Leave your current vessel and change into a bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults.\nUse the pad by double tapping while standing on it.
bundle_tk.properties.block.spirit-factory.description: Produces light drones which mine ore and repair blocks.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phantom-factory.description: Produces advanced drone units which are significantly more effective than a spirit drone.
bundle_tk.properties.block.repair-point.description: Continuously heals the closest damaged unit in its vicinity.
bundle_tk.properties.block.conduit.description: Basic liquid transport block. Works like a conveyor, but with liquids. Best used with extractors, pumps or other conduits.
bundle_tk.properties.block.pulse-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Transports liquids faster and stores more than standard conduits.
bundle_tk.properties.block.phase-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Uses power to teleport liquids to a connected phase conduit over several tiles.
bundle_tk.properties.block.liquid-router.description: Accepts liquids from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Can also store a certain amount of liquid. Useful for splitting the liquids from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_tk.properties.block.liquid-tank.description: Stores a large amount of liquids. Use it for creating buffers when there is a non-constant demand of materials or as a safeguard for cooling vital blocks.
bundle_tk.properties.block.liquid-junction.description: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conduits. Useful in situations with two different conduits carrying different liquids to different locations.
bundle_tk.properties.block.bridge-conduit.description: Advanced liquid transport block. Allows transporting liquids over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_tk.properties.block.mechanical-pump.description: A cheap pump with slow output, but no power consumption.
bundle_tk.properties.block.rotary-pump.description: An advanced pump which doubles up speed by using power.
bundle_tk.properties.block.thermal-pump.description: The ultimate pump. Three times as fast as a mechanical pump and the only pump which is able to retrieve lava.
bundle_tk.properties.block.router.description: Accepts items from one direction and outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
bundle_tk.properties.block.distributor.description: An advanced router which splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.
bundle_tk.properties.block.bridge-conveyor.description: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.
bundle_tk.properties.block.item-void.description: Destroys any items which go into it without using power. Sandbox only.
bundle_tk.properties.block.power-void.description: Voids all power inputted into it. Sandbox only.
bundle_tk.properties.liquid.water.description: Commonly used for cooling machines and waste processing.
bundle_tk.properties.liquid.oil.description: Can be burnt, exploded or used as a coolant.
bundle_tk.properties.liquid.cryofluid.description: The most efficient liquid for cooling things down.

bundle_tr.properties.mode.sandbox.name: Limitsiz Oynama
bundle_tr.properties.mode.sandbox.description: sonsuz kaynaklar ve dalgalar iin zamanlayc yok.

bundle_tr.properties.mode.attack.name: Attack

bundle_tr.properties.item.copper.name: Copper
bundle_tr.properties.item.copper.description: A useful structure material. Used extensively in all types of blocks.
bundle_tr.properties.item.lead.name: Lead
bundle_tr.properties.item.lead.description: A basic starter material. Used extensively in electronics and liquid transportation blocks.
bundle_tr.properties.item.coal.name: kmr
bundle_tr.properties.item.coal.description: A common and readily available fuel.
bundle_tr.properties.item.graphite.name: Graphite
bundle_tr.properties.item.titanium.name: titanyum
bundle_tr.properties.item.titanium.description: A rare super-light metal used extensively in liquid transportation, drills and aircraft.
bundle_tr.properties.item.thorium.name: Thorium
bundle_tr.properties.item.thorium.description: A dense, radioactive metal used as structural support and nuclear fuel.
bundle_tr.properties.item.silicon.name: Silicon
bundle_tr.properties.item.silicon.description: An extremely useful semiconductor, with applications in solar panels and many complex electronics.
bundle_tr.properties.item.plastanium.name: Plastanium
bundle_tr.properties.item.plastanium.description: A light, ductile material used in advanced aircraft and fragmentation ammunition.
bundle_tr.properties.item.phase-fabric.name: Phase Fabric
bundle_tr.properties.item.phase-fabric.description: A near-weightless substance used in advanced electronics and self-repairing technology.
bundle_tr.properties.item.surge-alloy.name: Surge Alloy
bundle_tr.properties.item.surge-alloy.description: An advanced alloy with unique electrical properties.
bundle_tr.properties.item.spore-pod.name: Spore Pod
bundle_tr.properties.item.spore-pod.description: Used for conversion into oil, explosives and fuel.
bundle_tr.properties.item.sand.name: kum
bundle_tr.properties.item.sand.description: A common material that is used extensively in smelting, both in alloying and as a flux.
bundle_tr.properties.item.blast-compound.name: Blast Compound
bundle_tr.properties.item.blast-compound.description: A volatile compound used in bombs and explosives. While it can burned as fuel, this is not advised.
bundle_tr.properties.item.pyratite.name: Pyratite
bundle_tr.properties.item.pyratite.description: An extremely flammable substance used in incendiary weapons.
bundle_tr.properties.item.metaglass.name: Metaglass
bundle_tr.properties.item.metaglass.description: A super-tough glass compound. Extensively used for liquid distribution and storage.
bundle_tr.properties.item.scrap.name: Scrap
bundle_tr.properties.item.scrap.description: Leftover remnants of old structures and units. Contains trace amounts of many different metals.
bundle_tr.properties.liquid.water.name: su
bundle_tr.properties.liquid.slag.name: Slag
bundle_tr.properties.liquid.oil.name: petrol
bundle_tr.properties.liquid.cryofluid.name: Cryofluid
bundle_tr.properties.mech.alpha-mech.name: Alpha
bundle_tr.properties.mech.alpha-mech.description: The standard mech. Has decent speed and damage output; can create up to 3 drones for increased offensive capability.
bundle_tr.properties.mech.delta-mech.name: Delta
bundle_tr.properties.mech.delta-mech.description: A fast, lightly-armored mech made for hit-and-run attacks. Does little damage against structures, but can kill large groups of enemy units very quickly with its arc lightning weapons.
bundle_tr.properties.mech.tau-mech.name: Tau
bundle_tr.properties.mech.tau-mech.description: The support mech. Heals allied blocks by shooting at them. Can extinguish fires and heal allies in a radius with its repair ability.
bundle_tr.properties.mech.omega-mech.name: Omega
bundle_tr.properties.mech.omega-mech.description: A bulky and well-armored mech, made for front-line assaults. Its armor ability can block up to 90% of incoming damage.
bundle_tr.properties.mech.dart-ship.name: Dart
bundle_tr.properties.mech.dart-ship.description: The standard ship. Reasonably fast and light, but has little offensive capability and low mining speed.
bundle_tr.properties.mech.javelin-ship.name: Javelin
bundle_tr.properties.mech.javelin-ship.description: A hit-and-run strike ship. While initially slow, it can accelerate to great speeds and fly by enemy outposts, dealing large amounts of damage with its lightning ability and missiles.
bundle_tr.properties.mech.trident-ship.name: Trident
bundle_tr.properties.mech.trident-ship.description: A heavy bomber. Reasonably well armored.
